properties.query:
// Author: Ginna Woo
// Description: Looks at dormant accounts (inactive accounts over 180 days) and the activities and risk events associated to those dormant accounts.
// False Positives: None known
let AL = (AuditLogs
    | join SigninLogs on ResourceId, CorrelationId
    | extend ActivityDateTimeAL = ActivityDateTime
    | extend TimeGeneratedAL = TimeGenerated
    | where ResultType1 == 0 and IPAddress !startswith "140" //successful sign in and if IPAddress sign-in is not from 140.xxx.xxx
    | extend InitiatedByUser = InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName
    | extend InitiatedByApp = InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalName
    | extend TargetedResource = TargetResources[0].displayName
    | extend TargetedUser = TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName
    | extend TargetedResourceProperties = TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties
| project Category, AADOperationType, ActivityDisplayName, OperationName,InitiatedByUser, InitiatedByApp, TargetedResource, TargetedUser, ActivityDateTimeAL, UserPrincipalName,TimeGeneratedAL, IPAddress, TargetedResourceProperties, AdditionalDetails);
BehaviorAnalytics
| where InvestigationPriority >= 0 //adjust sensitivity level on scale 0-10 (10 highest)
| evaluate bag_unpack(ActivityInsights, columnsConflict="replace_source")
| evaluate bag_unpack(UsersInsights, columnsConflict="replace_source")
| extend IsDormantAccount = column_ifexists("IsDormantAccount", "")
| extend IsNewAccount = column_ifexists("IsNewAccount", "")
| extend Resource = column_ifexists("Resource", "")
| extend DeviceUncommonlyUsedInTenant = column_ifexists("DeviceUncommonlyUsedInTenant", "")
| extend FirstTimeDeviceObservedInTenant = column_ifexists("FirstTimeDeviceObservedInTenant", "")
| extend FirstTimeUserAccessedResource = column_ifexists("FirstTimeUserAccessedResource", "")
| extend FirstTimeUserUsedApp = column_ifexists("FirstTimeUserUsedApp", "")
| extend ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser = column_ifexists("ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser", "")
| extend ResourceUncommonlyAccessedInTenant = column_ifexists("ResourceUncommonlyAccessedInTenant", "")
| extend UnusualNumberOfDistinctUsersFailedSignInFromIPAddress = column_ifexists("UnusualNumberOfDistinctUsersFailedSignInFromIPAddress", "")
| extend UnusualNumberOfFailedSignInOfThisUser = column_ifexists("UnusualNumberOfFailedSignInOfThisUser", "")
| extend UncommonHighVolumeOfActions = column_ifexists("UncommonHighVolumeOfActions", "")
| extend AppIdUncommonlyAccessedInTenant = column_ifexists("AppIdUncommonlyAccessedInTenant", "")
| extend AccountDisplayName = column_ifexists("AccountDisplayName", "")
| where IsDormantAccount == True // only include accounts not in use for > 180 days
| join kind=inner AL on UserPrincipalName
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated) by UserPrincipalName, AADOperationType,Category,OperationName,InvestigationPriority,ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser,UncommonHighVolumeOfActions,UnusualNumberOfFailedSignInOfThisUser,UnusualNumberOfDistinctUsersFailedSignInFromIPAddress,AppIdUncommonlyAccessedInTenant, FirstTimeDeviceObservedInTenant, FirstTimeUserAccessedResource, FirstTimeUserUsedApp, ResourceUncommonlyAccessedInTenant,IsDormantAccount, IPAddress, tostring(InitiatedByUser), tostring(InitiatedByApp), tostring(TargetedUser),tostring(TargetedResource), tostring(TargetedResourceProperties), tostring(AdditionalDetails)
